00025 /*! \file psht_geomhelpers.h
00026  *  PSHT helper function for the creation of grid geometries
00027  *
00028  *  Copyright (C) 2006, 2007, 2008 Max-Planck-Society
00029  *  \author Martin Reinecke
00030  */
00031 
00032 #ifndef PLANCK_PSHT_GEOMHELPERS_H
00033 #define PLANCK_PSHT_GEOMHELPERS_H
00034 
00035 #include "psht.h"
00036 
00037 #ifdef __cplusplus
00038 extern "C" {
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 /*! Creates a geometry information describing a HEALPix map with an
00042     Nside parameter \a nside.
00043     \ingroup geominfogroup */
00044 void psht_make_healpix_geom_info (int nside, int stride,
00045   psht_geom_info **geom_info);
00046 
00047 /*! Creates a geometry information describing a HEALPix map with an
00048     Nside parameter \a nside. \a weight contains the relative ring
00049     weights and must have \a 2*nside entries.
00050     \ingroup geominfogroup */
00051 void psht_make_weighted_healpix_geom_info (int nside, int stride,
00052   const double *weight, psht_geom_info **geom_info);
00053 
00054 /*! Creates a geometry information describing a Gaussian map with \a nrings
00055     iso-latitude rings and \a nphi pixels per ring. The azimuth of the first
00056     pixel in each ring is 0.
00057     \ingroup geominfogroup */
00058 void psht_make_gauss_geom_info (int nrings, int nphi, int stride,
00059   psht_geom_info **geom_info);
00060 
00061 /*! Creates a geometry information describing an ECP map with \a nrings
00062     iso-latitude rings and \a nphi pixels per ring. The azimuth of the first
00063     pixel in each ring is \a phi0 (in radians).
00064     \ingroup geominfogroup */
00065 void psht_make_ecp_geom_info (int nrings, int nphi, double phi0, int stride,
00066   psht_geom_info **geom_info);
00067 
00068 #ifdef __cplusplus
00069 }
00070 #endif
00071 
00072 #endif
